attributes.action: Abolish the Channel 4 Reality TV Show, Big Brother.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can this country be taken seriously when our radio, tv and conversations are overtaken by this show? Two instances of racism have now occured in the house this year alone, one incident which seriously damaged relationships with another country. After 4 successful and 4 appalling series, it's time for Big Brother to be evicted of our tellies.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
